## Descripción

- Label: Materia
- ApiName: Materia\_\_c
- Sharing Mode: ReadWrite
- Visibilidad: Public
- [Ver en Salesforce](https://test.salesforce.com/lightning/setup/ObjectManager/lookupRedirect?lookup=entityByApiName&apiName=Materia__c)
